en.title: Software Engineer
content: 1. Skilled in Vue development with experience maintaining ASP.NET MVC and Blazor sites.
2. Independently refactored a legacy backend system with phased deployments to improve performance.
3. Developed automation tools using PowerShell and Task Scheduler to optimize workflows.
4. Collaborated cross-functionally to plan and deliver projects on time.
5. Migrated hundreds of internal forms to responsive design, improving cross-device user experience.

zh.title: 軟體工程師
content: 1. **擅長 Vue 開發**並有維護 ASP.NET MVC 、Blazor 網站經驗
2. 具備獨立開發能力，重構舊有後台系統資料庫並實現階段性上線，確保系統順利過渡並提升效能
3. PowerShell 與 Task Scheduler 開發自動化工具，優化工作流程
4. 跨部門協作，規劃專案進度並按時交付
5. 成功將企業內部數百份表單導入響應式設計，提升維護效率與跨裝置體驗

en.title: Research Assistant
content: 1. Python to scrape foreign news source websites.
2. ShinyApp to create interactive charts, including descriptive analysis, trend graphs, mosaic plots, and social network graphs.
3. Plan a Python Flask framework website, using MongoDB to store data, and convert Excel and PDF files into data.
4. Experience with Git collaboration.
5. Write annual analysis reports and provide industry recommendations.

zh.title: 研究助理
content: 1. Python 抓取國外新聞來源網站
2. ShinyApp 製作互動式圖表，包含敘述性分析、趨勢圖、馬賽克圖與社群網路圖
3. 規劃 Python flask 框架網站，使用 MongoDB 儲存資料庫，並將 Excel、PDF 檔案轉為數據資料
4. 有 Git 協作經驗
5. 撰寫年度分析報告、提供產業建議
